title: Bingin Beach Chill (Half-day)
overview: Unwind at Bingin Beach, known for its surf breaks and laid-back atmosphere atop dramatic cliffs.

stops.description: Arrive and descend the steps to the beach, relax or surf.
Enjoy a snack or drink at a local shack.

title: Bingin Surf & Relax (Full-day)
overview: A full day of surfing, sunbathing, and cliffside relaxation at Bingin Beach.

stops.description: Surf or relax on the sand.
Lunch at a cliffside shack with ocean views.
Swim, sunbathe, or explore tide pools.
